description.value:
You have endured extensive training to withstand the rigors of combat, making you harder to cut down.

  • Your hit point maximum increases by 2 for each level you had previous to gaining this talent (if applicable). Each time you gain a new level, your hit point maximum increases by 2 (including for the level that allowed you to take this talent, if applicable).

  • When you roll hit dice to recover hit points, you can ignore die rolls lower than your PB and instead treat those dice as if you rolled a number equal to your PB.
